Please consider making a donation which we would allocate to one of these priority projects or you can choose how your gift is directed.

Emergency Health Fund for Tilokpur Nunnery, India.

These vulnerable nuns are living in close quarters without running water or modern conveniences. They are susceptible to serious illnesses and diseases. This fund will cover essential medical expenses at the nunnery or at the hospital as needed.

Construction of new facility in Palchen Choling Nunnery, Sikkim.

A new dormitory, classrooms, dining hall, library and shrine have been under construction since 2019 for 100 nuns. Donations will go toward the completion of this project.

Updates and repairs to the Thrangu Kong Jo Sherab Ling Nunnery shrine building in Tibet.

In 2010, an earthquake damaged the area greatly. Your donations will help us continue to rebuild this central part of their nunnery.
